page.title: 17C.E. School - Today
page.content: The present day school is housed in a modern single storey brick building completed and{first occupied}on{5th {Jun. 1967.}It{cost Â£24,411 to build} and{Â£2,245 to furnish and equip.}There are three class rooms, infants(5-7); juniors(8-9) & juniors(9-11). There is a fully fitted kitchen where dinners are prepared and the main hall can easily be rearranged to act as dining room, gymnasium, general meeting room or for seating the audience at{school} {concerts.}Part of the hall contains the library and micro. The whole building is centrally heated by means of an oil-fired boiler serving a piped hot water/radiator system. All toilet and washing facilities are indoors. There is a large outdoor asphalted playground and grassed playing area on the South side where we play football, rounders etc. and hold{School Sports.}
